org.helm.editor.controller
Class ModelController

java.lang.Object
  org.helm.editor.controller.ModelController

public class ModelController
extends java.lang.Object

This class controls the structure rendering in MacromoleculeEditor, MacroMoleculeViewer and SequenceViewerPanes via NotationUpdateEvent, which contains the new notation and owner code who fires the event. It is up to each listener to determine if the event should be handled.

Author:
zhangtianhong
